instructions.name: add_supported_token
docs: Add a supported SPL token (admin only)

instructions.name: complete_payment
docs: Complete payment with OTP verification

instructions.name: complete_payment_token
docs: Complete payment with SPL tokens

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposit SOL into user's TinyPay account

instructions.name: deposit_token
docs: Deposit SPL tokens

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the TinyPay system

instructions.name: merchant_precommit
docs: Merchant pre-commit for payment

instructions.name: pause_system
docs: Pause the system (admin only)

instructions.name: refresh_tail
docs: Refresh tail for user account

instructions.name: remove_supported_token
docs: Remove a supported SPL token (admin only)

instructions.name: resume_system
docs: Resume the system (admin only)

instructions.name: set_payment_limit
docs: Set payment limit for user account

instructions.name: set_tail_updates_limit
docs: Set tail updates limit for user account

instructions.name: update_fee_rate
docs: Update fee rate (admin only)

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw funds back to user's wallet

instructions.name: withdraw_fees
docs: Withdraw accumulated fees (admin only)

instructions.name: withdraw_token
docs: Withdraw SPL tokens

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient balance for the requested operation

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount provided (must be greater than 0)

errors.name: AccountNotInitialized
errors.msg: User account has not been initialized

errors.name: NotAdmin
errors.msg: Only admin can perform this operation

errors.name: PaymentLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Payment amount exceeds the configured limit

errors.name: TailUpdatesLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Tail update limit has been exceeded

errors.name: InvalidFeeRate
errors.msg: Invalid fee rate (must be <= 10000 basis points)

types.name: DepositMade
docs: Event emitted when a user makes a deposit

types.name: FeeRateUpdated
docs: Event emitted when fee rate is updated

types.name: FeesWithdrawn
docs: Event emitted when accumulated fees are withdrawn

types.name: PaymentCompleted
docs: Event emitted when a payment is completed

types.name: PaymentLimitUpdated
docs: Event emitted when payment limit is updated

types.name: PreCommit
docs: Pre-commit information for merchant payments

types.name: PreCommitCreated
docs: Event emitted when a merchant creates a pre-commit

types.name: SystemInitialized
docs: Event emitted when the system is initialized

types.name: SystemPaused
docs: Event emitted when system is paused

types.name: SystemResumed
docs: Event emitted when system is resumed

types.name: TailRefreshed
docs: Event emitted when tail is refreshed

types.name: TailUpdatesLimitSet
docs: Event emitted when tail updates limit is set

types.name: TinyPayState
docs: Global state for the TinyPay system

types.name: UserAccount
docs: User account information storing balance and tail

types.name: UserTokenAccount
docs: User token account for SPL tokens

types.name: Vault
docs: Vault for holding SOL

types.name: WithdrawalMade
docs: Event emitted when a withdrawal is made
